maiet.SCRIPT:
function NPC_7512000:Init( NPCID ) --[[ 1: Pain누적 수치 2: 날아다니는 시체 갯수 --]] NPC_ReserveUserData( NPCID, 2 )
NPC_7512000.TalIdPain1 = 251200001 NPC_7512000.TalIdPain2 = 251200002 NPC_7512000.TalIdGroundOfDarkness = 251200020 NPC_7512000.TalIdBellOfSummon = 251200007
NPC_7512000.NpcIdSkillDummy = 7512003 NPC_7512000.NpcIdFloatingCorpse = 7512004
NPC_7512000.TalIdMarchingQuake1 = 251200010 NPC_7512000.TalIdMarchingQuake2 = 251200011 NPC_7512000.TalIdMarchingQuake3 = 251200012 NPC_7512000.TalIdMarchingQuake4 = 251200013
NPC_7512000.DataIdxPain = 1 NPC_7512000.DataIdxMinionCnt = 2 NPC_7512000.MaxCorpseCnt = 2
NPC_7512000.LimitForPain = 10*10 end
-- 소환스킬 전처리 function NPC_7512000:SummonFloatingCorpse( ThisNPC, Enemy ) --GLog( "NPC_7512000:SummonFloatingCorpse\n" ) if ThisNPC:GetUserData( NPC_7512000.DataIdxMinionCnt ) < NPC_7512000.MaxCorpseCnt then ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_7512000.TalIdBellOfSummon, Enemy ) end end
function NPC_7512000:UseMarchingQuake( ThisNPC, Enemy ) --GLog( "NPC_7512000:UseMarchingQuake\n" ) if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_7512000.TalIdMarchingQuake1 ) then return end
local n = math.random( 0, 3 )
--GLog( n ) if n == 0 then ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_7512000.TalIdMarchingQuake1, Enemy ) elseif n == 1 then ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_7512000.TalIdMarchingQuake2, Enemy ) elseif n == 2 then ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_7512000.TalIdMarchingQuake3, Enemy ) else ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_7512000.TalIdMarchingQuake4, Enemy ) end end
-- 부유하는 시체 소환 function NPC_7512000:OnFinishBellOfSummon( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor) --GLog( "NPC_7512000:OnFinishBellOfSummon\n" )
--GLog( Enemy:GetName() .. "\n" ) local WorldPos = Enemy:GetPos()
-- spawn floating corpse local Minion = ThisNPC:SummonNow( NPC_7512000.NpcIdFloatingCorpse, WorldPos ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_7512000.DataIdxMinionCnt, ThisNPC:GetUserData(NPC_7512000.DataIdxMinionCnt)+1 )
-- spawn ground of darkness Minion = ThisNPC:SummonNow( NPC_7512000.NpcIdSkillDummy, WorldPos ) Minion:UseTalentSelf( NPC_512003.TalIdGroundOfDarkness )
--GLog( "Corpse count = " .. ThisNPC:GetUserData(1) .. "\n" ) end
function NPC_7512000:OnFinishMarchingQuake1( ThisNPC, Enemy ) local Minion = NPC_7512000:SpawnMarchingQuake( ThisNPC, Enemy ) Minion:UseTalentSelf( NPC_512003.TalIdMarchingQuake1 ) end
function NPC_7512000:OnFinishMarchingQuake2( ThisNPC, Enemy ) local Minion = NPC_7512000:SpawnMarchingQuake( ThisNPC, Enemy ) Minion:UseTalentSelf( NPC_512003.TalIdMarchingQuake2 ) end
function NPC_7512000:OnFinishMarchingQuake3( ThisNPC, Enemy ) local Minion = NPC_7512000:SpawnMarchingQuake( ThisNPC, Enemy ) Minion:UseTalentSelf( NPC_512003.TalIdMarchingQuake3 ) end
function NPC_7512000:OnFinishMarchingQuake4( ThisNPC, Enemy ) local Minion = NPC_7512000:SpawnMarchingQuake( ThisNPC, Enemy ) Minion:UseTalentSelf( NPC_512003.TalIdMarchingQuake4 ) end
function NPC_7512000:SpawnMarchingQuake( ThisNPC, Enemy ) local WorldPos = Math_LocalToWorld( Enemy:GetDir(), Enemy:GetPos(), vec3(0,0,0) ) return AsNPC(ThisNPC):SummonNow( NPC_7512000.NpcIdSkillDummy, WorldPos ) end
-- 고통의 대지 탤런트 콜백 function NPC_7512000:OnFinishGroundOfDarkness( ThisNPC, Enemy ) --GLog( "NPC_7512000:OnFinishGroundOfDarkness\n") NPC_7512000:SpawnGroundOfDarkness(ThisNPC, Enemy) end
-- 전투시작 function NPC_7512000:OnCombatBegin( ) --GLog( "NPC_7512000:OnCombatBegin\n" ) -- 부유하는 시체 갯수 초기화
this:SetUserData( NPC_7512000.DataIdxMinionCnt, 0) end
function NPC_7512000:AccDamage( ThisNPC, PartsIdx, HitInfo ) local PainPoint = GetPainPoint( HitInfo ) local AccPainPoint = ThisNPC:GetUserData( NPC_7512000.DataIdxPain ) + PainPoint if AccPainPoint > NPC_7512000.LimitForPain and ( not ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_7512000.TalIdPain1 ) ) then ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_7512000.TalIdPain1 ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_7512000.DataIdxPain, 0 ) return HitInfo end
ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_7512000.DataIdxPain, AccPainPoint )
return HitInfo end
function NPC_7512000:OnHitCapsule_1_0(HitInfo) return NPC_7512000:AccDamage( this, 1, HitInfo ) end
